xcsf
Class XCSFConstants

java.lang.Object
  xcsf.XCSFConstants

public class XCSFConstants
extends java.lang.Object

Makes available all kinds of XCSF constants (static).

Author:
Patrick O. Stalph, Martin V. Butz

Field Summary
static double alpha
          The accuracy factor (decrease) in inaccurate classifiers.
static int averageExploitTrials
          The number of test instances that should be averaged in the performance evaluation.
static double beta
          The learning rate for updating fitness, prediction error, and action set size estimate in XCS's classifiers.
static int compactionType
          The compaction type.
static double coverConditionRange
          Specifies the variation in size of randomly created conditions, ofter referred to as r0.
static double delta
          The fraction of the mean fitness of the population below which the fitness of a classifier may be considered in its vote for deletion.
static boolean doGASubsumption
          Specifies if GA subsumption should be executed.
static boolean doNumClosestMatch
          Specifies if the num closest classifiers should be considered in the match set.
static boolean doRandomize
          Specifies if the seed should be randomized (based on the current milliseconds of the computer time)
static boolean doWriteOutput
          If the settings and experimental results should be written out after all runs.
static boolean doWritePopulation
          If the final popualtion should be written out after each run.
static double epsilon_0
          The error threshold under which the accuracy of a classifier is set to one.
static double eta
          The learning rate for updating the prediction.
static double fitnessIni
          The initial fitness value when generating a new classifier (e.g in covering).
static double fitnessReduction
          The factor (reduction) of the fitness when generating an offspring classifier.
static long initialSeed
          The initialization of the pseudo random generator.
static double lambdaRLS
          Forget rate for RLS Danger: small values may lead to instabilities! Default: 1
static int maxLearningIterations
          The number of learning iterations in one experiment.
static int maxPopSize
          Specifies the maximal number of micro-classifiers in the population.
static double minConditionStretch
          Specifies the minimum size of a condition part Default: 0
static double nu
          Specifies the exponent in the power function for the fitness evaluation.
static int numberOfExperiments
          Specifies the number of investigated experiments.
static int numClosestMatch
          The number of closest classifiers that will be included in the match set if doNumCloestMatch is set to true; Default: 20
static java.lang.String outputFolder
          The file name that is used to create the output folder.
static double pM
          The probability of mutating one allele, often termed mu, (and the action) in an offspring classifier.
static double predictionErrorIni
          The initial prediction error value when generating a new classifier (e.g in covering).
static double predictionErrorReduction
          The factor (reduction) of the prediction error when generating an offspring classifier.
static double predictionOffsetValue
          The offset value that is added in real-valued prediction for the prediction generation (added to the input values).
static double pX
          The probability to apply crossover to the offspring, often termed chi.
static int resetRLSPredictionsAfterSteps
          If set, then after the specified number of iterations, all gain matrizes are reset according to the initial scale factor.
static double rlsInitScaleFactor
          The initialization vector of the diagonal in the inverse covariance matrix for RLS-based predictions.
static double selectionType
          Choice of selection type 0 = proportionate selection; ]0,1] = tournament selection (set-size proportional) Default: .4 (tournament selection)
static int startCompaction
          The number of explore problems after which compaction starts.
static int theta_del
          Specified the threshold over which the fitness of a classifier may be considered in its deletion probability.
static double theta_GA
          The threshold for the GA application.
static int theta_sub
          The experience of a classifier required to be a subsumer.

Field Detail

outputFolder

public static java.lang.String outputFolder
The file name that is used to create the output folder.

doWriteOutput

public static boolean doWriteOutput
If the settings and experimental results should be written out after all runs.

doWritePopulation

public static boolean doWritePopulation
If the final popualtion should be written out after each run.

numberOfExperiments

public static int numberOfExperiments
Specifies the number of investigated experiments.

averageExploitTrials

public static int averageExploitTrials
The number of test instances that should be averaged in the performance evaluation.

maxLearningIterations

public static int maxLearningIterations
The number of learning iterations in one experiment.

maxPopSize

public static int maxPopSize
Specifies the maximal number of micro-classifiers in the population. In the multiplexer problem this value is often set to 400, 800, 1600 in the 6, 11, 20 multiplexer resp..

alpha

public static double alpha
The accuracy factor (decrease) in inaccurate classifiers. Default: 1

beta

public static double beta
The learning rate for updating fitness, prediction error, and action set size estimate in XCS's classifiers. Default: .1

eta

public static double eta
The learning rate for updating the prediction. Default: .1

delta

public static double delta
The fraction of the mean fitness of the population below which the fitness of a classifier may be considered in its vote for deletion. Default: .1

minConditionStretch

public static double minConditionStretch
Specifies the minimum size of a condition part Default: 0

coverConditionRange

public static double coverConditionRange
Specifies the variation in size of randomly created conditions, ofter referred to as r0. Default: 1

startCompaction

public static int startCompaction
The number of explore problems after which compaction starts.

compactionType

public static int compactionType
The compaction type. 0 = condensation, normal matching 1 = condensation, closest classifier matching 2 = greedy compaction plus condensation, normal matching 3 = greedy compaction plus condensation and closest classifier matching Default: 1

doNumClosestMatch

public static boolean doNumClosestMatch
Specifies if the num closest classifiers should be considered in the match set. Otherwise, normal threshold matching applies Default: false

numClosestMatch

public static int numClosestMatch
The number of closest classifiers that will be included in the match set if doNumCloestMatch is set to true; Default: 20

rlsInitScaleFactor

public static double rlsInitScaleFactor
The initialization vector of the diagonal in the inverse covariance matrix for RLS-based predictions. Default: 1000

lambdaRLS

public static double lambdaRLS
Forget rate for RLS Danger: small values may lead to instabilities! Default: 1

resetRLSPredictionsAfterSteps

public static int resetRLSPredictionsAfterSteps
If set, then after the specified number of iterations, all gain matrizes are reset according to the initial scale factor. Default: starts with compaction.

See Also:
rlsInitScaleFactor

predictionOffsetValue

public static double predictionOffsetValue
The offset value that is added in real-valued prediction for the prediction generation (added to the input values).

nu

public static double nu
Specifies the exponent in the power function for the fitness evaluation. Default: 5

epsilon_0

public static double epsilon_0
The error threshold under which the accuracy of a classifier is set to one. Default: .01

predictionErrorReduction

public static double predictionErrorReduction
The factor (reduction) of the prediction error when generating an offspring classifier. Default: 1

fitnessReduction

public static double fitnessReduction
The factor (reduction) of the fitness when generating an offspring classifier. Default: .1

predictionErrorIni

public static double predictionErrorIni
The initial prediction error value when generating a new classifier (e.g in covering). Default: 0

fitnessIni

public static double fitnessIni
The initial fitness value when generating a new classifier (e.g in covering). Default: .01

theta_GA

public static double theta_GA
The threshold for the GA application. Default: 50.

selectionType

public static double selectionType
Choice of selection type 0 = proportionate selection; ]0,1] = tournament selection (set-size proportional) Default: .4 (tournament selection)

pM

public static double pM
The probability of mutating one allele, often termed mu, (and the action) in an offspring classifier. Default: .05

pX

public static double pX
The probability to apply crossover to the offspring, often termed chi. Default: 1

theta_del

public static int theta_del
Specified the threshold over which the fitness of a classifier may be considered in its deletion probability. Default: 20

theta_sub

public static int theta_sub
The experience of a classifier required to be a subsumer. Default: 20

doGASubsumption

public static boolean doGASubsumption
Specifies if GA subsumption should be executed. Default: true

initialSeed

public static long initialSeed
The initialization of the pseudo random generator. Must be at least one and smaller than 2147483647. Will be used only if "doRandomize" is set to false.

doRandomize

public static boolean doRandomize
Specifies if the seed should be randomized (based on the current milliseconds of the computer time)

Constructor Detail

XCSFConstants

public XCSFConstants()
Method Detail

load

public static void load(java.lang.String filename)
                 throws java.io.IOException
Trys to set the properties from the specified filename.

Parameters:
filename - The name (relative to start directory or absolute) to the parameter file.
Throws:
java.io.IOException - if the file could not be loaded.
